mission.title: Design That Supports More Than Brands — It Supports Causes.
mission.description: We've spent years helping businesses grow through design. But we knew we could do more. The **Design for Good** Initiative is our commitment to social good — offering high-quality creative to nonprofits at a fraction of the cost.
mission.highlight: We're launching with space for just 10 founding organizations. You'll receive priority service, discounted pricing, and direct input into how this grows.
